messages.messageBody:
HHAAAZZZAAAHHHH!!!!!

--- On Mon, 9/7/09, Mio Yamada <purplealienmio@...> wrote:

From: Mio Yamada <purplealienmio@...>
Subject: [SHQ] (unknown)
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, September 7, 2009, 11:58 AM






 





Hello hello,



I don't know how much interest there might be but I have finally, finally updated my fic "The Courtship of Lady Tokio". Shameless plug:



http://www.fanficti on.net/s/ 2049030/28/ The_Courtship_ of_Lady_Tokio



This one and the next chapter features quite a bit of Itou in it. I'm sorry if people don't like my portrayal of his character.

Also, since I dedicated this story to Hakubaikou, I wil be finishing it.



Best wishes,

Mio

Hello hello,

I don't know how much interest there might be but I have finally, finally updated my fic "The Courtship of Lady Tokio". Shameless plug:

http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2049030/28/The_Courtship_of_Lady_Tokio

This one and the next chapter features quite a bit of Itou in it. I'm sorry if people don't like my portrayal of his character.
Also, since I dedicated this story to Hakubaikou, I wil be finishing it.

Best wishes,
Mio

I rather liked that rendition, but the whole thing is great anyway.

--- On Tue, 9/1/09, secretarytocapt3 <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

From: secretarytocapt3 <secretarytocapt3@...>
Subject: [SHQ] Re: Women of the Shinsengumi
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, September 1, 2009, 10:09 PM






 





I do want to update you on that story---it's being turned into a 10 page graphic novel pitch and a very talented artist is working on this project right now.



Ofcourse it'll go on...SHQ for everyone in our community to see.



I do not think this version of Fujita Gorou will disappoint (although his name is spelled different in this story).



--- In SHQ@yahoogroups. com, Radha Govinda <nefret_nubti@ ...> wrote:

>

> I completely miss hearing from you ! and have lost your web addy with that fabulous story on it. Oh well I spose next time I get payed I will look into getting that book. So far I cant find it, but if any one can I would be willing to buy it. You should im me sometime ... when you have time !
